KOUSA: To my friends returning from the expedition to the stormy planet: I hope that you have been well!
2
1
KOUSA: I have heard many tales of your hardships during your stay, and could not help but wonder if there was not something I could do to help..
3
2
KOUSA: This is why I have engineered a new invention to offer protection from these storms, with great help from our friends in the <color=orange>Sunless City</color> - the storm shelter!
4
3
KOUSA: The storm shelter is a device that generates a gravity field designed to hold Nomai in place, perfect for protecting Nomai in zero-gravity.
5 3
KOUSA: Thanks to the <color=orange>Sunless City's</color> contributions, the device is able to autonomously power itself when islands are launched into orbit, and even deactivates on its own afterwards to conserve power.
6 5
KOUSA: I humbly invite you to visit my workshop soon so I may share this invention with you, and send it with you on your next expedition!
7 6
PLUME: How incredible, Kousa! I must thank our friends from the <color=orange>Sunless City</color> when we next set off for our an expedition together.
8 7
PLUME: And of course, you have my deepest gratitude for your hard work, Kousa. I shall visit the <color=orange>Gravity Crystal Workshop</color> as soon as I can after my rest.
